Package gui

Class SearchBookFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.SearchBookFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class SearchBookFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for the Search Book Frame UI. Provides functionality for searching books by various criteria, displaying search results, and performing actions like lending or reserving books.

    • handleSearchAction

      private void handleSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the search button click event. Performs a search based on the selected criteria and updates the table with results.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the search button.

    • filterUniqueBooks

      private List<Book> filterUniqueBooks(List<Book> booksList)
      Filters the book list to include only unique books by serial ID for non-librarian users.
      Parameters:
      booksList - The original list of books.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of unique books.

    • updateBookAvailability

      private void updateBookAvailability(Object[] bookInfoList)
      Updates the availability and closest return date information for books.
      Parameters:
      bookInfoList - The book info list containing availability and return date data.

    • SelectRow

      private void SelectRow(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles row selection in the table. Enables or disables buttons based on the selected book's availability.
      Parameters:
      event - The mouse event triggered by selecting a row in the table.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during row selection.

    • Lend

      private void Lend(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the lend button click event. Opens the Borrow Book Frame for lending the selected book.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the lend button.

    • Reserve

      private void Reserve(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the reserve button click event. Sends a request to reserve the selected book.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the reserve button.

      Parameters:

      Exception - If an error occurs during initialization.
